  • Method Details

    • allReports

      @GetMapping("/reports") public String allReports(@RequestParam(value="orderType",required=false) String orderType, @RequestParam(value="searchType",required=false) String searchType, @RequestParam(value="searchInput",required=false) String searchInput, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      It gets all reports from database by parameters and returns them to the view
      Parameters:
      orderType - It is used to sort the reports.
      searchType - It is the type of search.
      searchInput - The input that the user has entered in the search bar.
      model - The model is a Map that is used to store the data that will be displayed on the view page.
      Returns:
      A list of reports.

    • addReportPage

      @GetMapping("/addReport") public String addReportPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This function is used to redirect to add report page
      Parameters:
      model - The model is a Map of model objects which will be passed to the view page.
      Returns:
      A string that is the name of the html file that is being returned.

    • addReport

      @PostMapping("/addReport") public String addReport(@ModelAttribute Report report, @RequestParam("diagnosis-img") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile multipartFile, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      It adds a report to the database.
      Parameters:
      report - This is the object that will be used to store the data that is entered into the form.
      multipartFile - The file that is uploaded.
      model - The model is a Map that is used to store the data that will be displayed on the view page.
      Returns:
      a String.

    • report

      @GetMapping("/report/{reportId}") public String report(@PathVariable String reportId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      It gets the report with the given id and returns the report page
      Parameters:
      reportId - The id of the report that we want to see.
      model - The model is a Map that is used to store the data that needs to be displayed on the view page.
      Returns:
      A report page with the report's information.

    • downloadReportImage

      @GetMapping("/downloadImage/{reportId}") public void downloadReportImage(@PathVariable String reportId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      It takes a reportId, gets the image from the database, and writes it to the response
      Parameters:
      reportId - The id of the report you want to download the image for.
      response - The response object that will be used to send the image to the client.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteReport

      @GetMapping("/deleteReport/{reportId}") public String deleteReport(@PathVariable String reportId, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws IOException
      The function takes in a reportId and a model, and then deletes the report with the given reportId, and then redirects the user to the reports page
      Parameters:
      reportId - The id of the report to be deleted.
      model - This is the model object that is used to pass data from the controller to the view.
      Returns:
      A string that redirects to the reports page.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • editReport

      @GetMapping("/editReport/{reportId}") public String editReport(@PathVariable String reportId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This function shows the editReport page
      Parameters:
      reportId - The id of the report to be edited.
      model - This is the model that will be passed to the view.
      Returns:
      The editReport.html page is being returned.

    • editReport

      @PostMapping("/editReport") public String editReport(@ModelAttribute Report report, @RequestParam("diagnosis-img") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile multipartFile, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This function is used to edit a report
      Parameters:
      report - The report object that is sent from the form.
      multipartFile - The file that is uploaded.
      model - The model is an object containing all model attributes.
      Returns:
      a String.
